TopicTitle: SpaceRace RP, looking for more members

Articles.Content:
SpaceRace RP is a KSP role play based on a core set of rules and focused on conquest of the Kerbol system. We operate through a main website and the KLF plugin.

For more info, or if you'd like to sign up, go here http://spaceracerp.enjin.com/home

(Highly) Recommended mods:

Kethane

KLF client

Hey I'm the founder of the RP, here to shed some light for people so they know EXACTLY what this is.

First of all, the Space Race RP is in no way related to the real event, and in fact plays off the name in a literal sense. The basis of the whole thing is that you play the part of a starting empire owner, and want to expand outward. Obviously you need a place to do all of this, so (this is where the name comes from) you race to the other planets against other empires in hopes of claiming it. Of course you don't have to be an empire owner, you can be a mercenary. Or a space pirate! It's all up to you. Once you get a planet, you now have to defend it. This is done by accumulating vessels, probes, etc (each of different value) in said planets SoI. Once you feel comfortable you can then set out to make your mark in the solar system, participating in political events, scenarios, etc. Or you can team up! Partner with your friends, buy out empires, do whatever you want, the whole RP revolves around the concept of open world. Furthermore there are NO required mods, save KLF! Meaning you can go in with B9, Orbital Construction, Kethane, whatever! I hope to see you guys soon!

Official Space Race Roleplay website:

http://spaceracerp.enjin.com/
